ComicInfo.Summary: Trashed!: Chas Worthington, heir to the Worthington Corp oil fortune, is traveling the world, trying to figure out what to do with his life. When visiting a company oil rig he talks about the potential of HERO a new tech to clean up oil spills. He then fakes his own death to explore the Great Pacific Garbage Patch.
ComicInfo.Title: Trashed!
